nav.div: Flagler Schools » About Us » Newsroom » What's New » COVID-19 Survey

span.style: font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif;;font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.em: Sharing on behalf of the Florida Department of Health and Florida Department of Education.

br.br: As Florida continues to work to fight the spread of COVID-19, the Florida Department of Health today launched a new public website,

span.span: StrongerThanC-19. This community action survey is intended for Florida residents to anonymously answer a brief series of questions which the Department will use to help inform and improve the state’s response to COVID-19.

span.style: background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;;line-height: 16.8667px;;line-height: 18.4px;

br.span: Each Floridian is asked to do their part to slow the spread of COVID-19 in Florida by spending less than two minutes answering the community action survey questions. Once completed, you will have the option to share the StrongerThanC-19 website with your family and friends via social media or email.

span.style: background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;;line-height: 16.8667px;;line-height: 18.4px;
span.a: The StrongerThanC-19 media release can be review here for additional information.

span.style: background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;;line-height: 16.8667px;;line-height: 18.4px;

br.span: Your dedication during these ever-changing times is greatly valued and appreciated. Be assured, Florida is stronger than COVID-19; and together, we can flatten the curve.

span.style: background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;;line-height: 16.8667px;

br.span: For updates regarding COVID-19 from the Florida Department of Education, including free distance learning resources and guidance, please visit

ul.li: 1769 East Moody Blvd. Bldg #2, Bunnell, FL 32110
